channel.title: Mangala Shri Bhuti - The Link
channel.itunes:subtitle: Weekly Teachings Via Web Conference
channel.itunes:author: Dzigar Kongtrul Rinpoche and students
channel.description: Mangala Shri Bhuti is pleased to announce weekly teachings by web conference by Dzigar Kongtrul Rinpoche, Jampal Norbu Namgyel, Elizabeth Mattis Namgyel, and senior students of Mangala Shri Bhuti.

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Wisdom Productions of Mangala Shri Bhuti

item.itunes:subtitle: Dzigar Kongtrul Rinpoche from Dzogchen Beara, Ireland, 2 August, 2009
